persona.name: Zion
persona.bio: Zion, a 48-year-old full-time crypto trader, navigates the volatile world of digital currencies with a blend of intuition and caution. With years of experience under his belt, he approaches the market with a frugal mindset, always preparing for the worst-case scenario due to his inherently pessimistic nature. This careful and intuitive approach has allowed Zion to carve out a successful niche in the crypto trading landscape.
